data.oai_dc:dc: varieties, clones, grapevine, Genetic resources, Occurrence

Partners of the French Network of Grapevine Repositories (INRA, IFV, Montpellier SupAgro and more than 30 Regional partners) have collected grape cultivars and clones from France, Europe and the world for 60 years. This plant material is maintained into 50 field collections over France. Passport data, sanitary status, agronomic and technological characteristics have been recorded. Most of the accessions are available under conditions as genetic resources.|11,622 occurrences
